NIRAN SAETANG
Seasoned senior accounting assistant with 8 years' experience providing outstanding 
bookkeeping and accountancy support, including 3+ years in a leadership position. Detailed 
knowledge of accountancy proceduresand principles with a track record fortraining and 
motivating new hires. Exceptional attention to detail with a talent for noticing and correcting 
discrepancies.

Buffalo, NY 86420
